mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FM_INQUIRY VALUE(FM_INQUIRY_NO, FM_USER_NO, FM_INQUIRY_TITLE, FM_INQUIRY_CONTENT, FM_INQUIRY_CRE_DATE, FM_INQUIRY_MOD_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_FM_INQUIRY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{uNo}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO FM_INQUIRY_REPLY VALUE(FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_NO, FM_USER_NO, FM_INQUIRY_NO, FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_CONTENT, FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_CRE_DATE, FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_PARENT) VALUES(SEQ_FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{uNo}, #{bNo}, #{irContent}, SYSDATE, #{irParentNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT iqr.FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_NO, iqr.FM_INQUIRY_NO, iqr.FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_CONTENT, iqr.FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_CRE_DATE, u.FM_USER_NICKNAME FROM FM_INQUIRY_REPLY iqr INNER JOIN FM_USER u ON u.FM_USER_NO = iqr.FM_USER_NO WHERE FM_INQUIRY_NO = #{bNo} ORDER BY iqr.FM_INQUIRY_REPLY_CRE_DATE ASC
